description: Retrieves a list that describes one or more specified users in the user pool.

parameters.name: AuthenticationType
parameters.description: The authentication type for the users in the user pool to describe. You must specify USERPOOL.

nested_items.name: Users
nested_items.description: Information about users in the user pool.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the user in the user pool is enabled.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the user in the user pool. The status can be one of the following:
UNCONFIRMED --- The user is created but not confirmed.
ARCHIVED --- The user is no longer active.
COMPROMISED --- The user is disabled because of a potential security threat.
UNKNOWN --- The user status is not known.

nested_items.name: FirstName
nested_items.description: The first name, or given name, of the user.

nested_items.name: LastName
nested_items.description: The last name, or surname, of the user.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the user was created in the user pool.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationType
nested_items.description: The authentication type for the user.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to retrieve the next page of results for this operation. If there are no more pages, this value is null.
